EmailTemplate.name: LE-2021-12-08-EM-Q4-Client-Connections.email-2
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name}}, Client Connections - December 8th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CLIENT CONNECTIONS EVENT Gathering Benefits Leaders for Candid Conversations Wednesday, April 28 4-5 PM ET
We want to hear from you. Join us and a select group of your peers for intimate and dynamic conversations on employee wellness opportunities and shared challenges. Unlike other webinars, this event encourages your involvement and will provide participants an inside look at our product roadmap and vision.
This event is meant to create a community to share any challenges, ideas or lessons to help us transform healthcare together. Plus, all registrants will get to choose a special thank you gift from Loop & Tie's exclusive collection!
REGISTER NOW https://livongo.zoom.us/meeting/register/tJIrc-CrqjIuGNfAhOVze8OoG_61SkTiDAh9
Sincerely,
Mike Rolla Senior Vice President Teladoc Health
================================================================================
Participate in conversations around: - Strategic objectives and how your peers approach those same opportunities - Innovative strategies to address pain points - Ways to elevate benefits from "sick" care to proactive wellness
================================================================================
Speaker
Mike McAfee Vice President, Product US Group Health Teladoc Health
================================================================================
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
================================================================================
